title: The Four seasons
brief_description: World famous Maestro, Lorin Maazel and soloists of the National Orchestra of France perform Vivaldi’s baroque masterpiece, “The Four Seasons”. Each concerto describes a different season and the music is brought alive in colour panoramas of four great cities: Paris in Spring, New York in Summer, Venice in Autumn, Moscow in Winter. Rating: G
